sourcesContent:
const constants = {
  GET_ALL_POSTS: 'data:get-all-posts',
  ADD_POST: 'data:add-new-post',
  UPDATE_IMAGE: 'user:update-profile-photo',
  FETCH_NOTIFICATIONS: 'user:fetch-notifications',
  UPDATE_USER_INFO: 'user:update-info',
  LOGIN_USER: 'user:login-user',
  LOGOUT_USER: 'user:logout-user',
  LOGIN_RECOVER: 'user:login-recover',
  ADD_ERROR: 'ui:add-error',
  REFRESH: 'ui:change-refresh',
  CLEAR_ERRORS: 'ui:clear-errors',
  UI_ALERTS: 'ui:alert',
  TOGGLE_LOADING: 'ui:loading',
  MODAL_STATUS: 'ui:change-modal-status',
  FETCH_COMMENTS: 'ui:get-all-comments'
};

export default constants;
